hero.title: Communication & Signal Processing Research Group
hero.subtitle: Development, Analysis & Application of Modern Communication Systems
paragraphs: The Communication and Signal Processing Research Group focuses on the development, analysis, and application of techniques for transmitting, receiving, and processing information-bearing signals.
The group conducts both theoretical and experimental research across various domains of modern communication systems.

activities.title: Digital Signal Processing (DSP)
activities.desc: Developing algorithms for signal enhancement, filtering, compression, and feature extraction.

activities.title: Wireless Communication Systems
activities.desc: Investigating physical layer protocols for 5G, 6G, and future wireless technologies.

activities.title: MIMO and Beamforming
activities.desc: Exploring spatial signal processing techniques to increase channel capacity and reliability.

activities.title: Machine Learning for Signal Processing
activities.desc: Applying AI and deep learning models to improve communication system performance.

activities.title: Software-Defined Radio (SDR)
activities.desc: Implementing and testing real-time communication algorithms on hardware platforms.

activities.title: Spectrum Sensing and Cognitive Radio
activities.desc: Researching adaptive spectrum access techniques for dynamic spectrum allocation.
